name: Gengar
flavorText:
Under a full moon,
this POKéMON
likes to mimic the shadows of
people and laugh
at their fright.

previous.name: Haunter
previous.flavorText:
Because of its
ability to slip
through block walls, it is said
to be from an­
other dimension.

next.name: Onix
next.flavorText:
As it grows, the
stone portions of
its body harden to become similar
to a diamond, but
colored black.

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.flavorText:
Almost invisible,
this gaseous
POKéMON cloaks the target and
puts it to sleep
without notice.
